name: Mr. Pickles
summary: 围绕着居住在遭受现代社会都市化侵蚀的老城镇的古德曼一家，与他们可爱的宠物狗——腌黄瓜先生，一条神秘撒旦教倾向的古怪边牧讲述的日常。
info:
• 中文名: 腌黄瓜先生
  • 话数: 11
  • 放送开始: 2014年9月21日
  • 放送星期: 星期日
  • 别名: 腌黄瓜先生 第一季
  • 别名: Mr. Pickles Season 1 (2014)
  • 官方网站: http://www.adultswim.com/videos/mr-pickles/
  • 播放电视台: adult swim
  • 播放结束: 2014年11月23日
  • 其他: 2013年8月26日（试播集）
  • 导演: 威尔·卡索拉

eps.name: Tommy's Big Job
eps.desc: Tommy falls for a young farmer girl, but she's not interested in a man without a job. Tommy sets out to find a job.

eps.name: Father's Day Pie
eps.desc: When Mr. Goodman's Father's Day pie goes missing, Tommy and Mr. Pickles set out searching for the pie thief, but meet an unexpected creature in the forest.

eps.name: The Cheeseman
eps.desc: he Goodmans go on a family camping trip and Tommy learns the frightening legend of The Cheeseman.

eps.name: Dead Man's Curve
eps.desc: Tommy enters the soapbox derby and Grandpa finds Mr. Pickles' biggest fear.

eps.name: Loose Tooth
eps.desc: Tommy sets out with Mr. Pickles to lose his tooth so he can meet the Tooth Fairy. Meanwhile, Sheriff searches for a group of wanted pedophiles.

eps.name: Grandpa's Night Out
eps.desc: Grandpa wakes up hungover and soon finds out that he made a horrible mistake the night before.

eps.name: Coma
eps.desc: Mr. Goodman wonders how easy his life would be if he were a dog, and when he gets knocked unconscious, he soon finds out.

eps.name: Where Is Mr. Pickles?
eps.desc: Mr. Pickles gets dog-napped as a gang of bounty hunters race to collect the bounty on his head.

eps.name: The Lair
eps.desc: Grandpa goes on a quest to discover what really is happening inside Mr. Pickles' doghouse, and to prove once and for all that he is not crazy.
